T02D3590:218b-1: panytsa de wa t'i s'a dha nam autde sha /
T02D3590:218b-3: lha mo lnga'i sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa /
T02D3590:218b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3590:218b-5: de nas khrus byas pa'i mthar lha mo lnga mdor bstan pa ni /
T02D3590:218b-6: de la so so 'brang ba chen mo ni sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum pa /
T02D3590:218b-7: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa /
T02D3590:218b-10: dkar po dag ni g-yas dang /
T02D3590:218b-12: g-yas kyi phyag lnga rnams ni go rims bzhin du ral gri dang /
T02D3590:218b-16: phyag thugs kar gnas pa la gdugs rnams so //
T02D3590:218b-17: de bzhin drug du g-yon gyi phyag lnga rnams na gzhu dang /
T02D3590:218b-19: rin po che'i chun po dang /
T02D3590:218b-22: rin chen 'byung ldan kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3590:218b-24: stod g-yogs dmar pos brgyan pa /
T02D3590:218b-25: skyil krung phyed pas 'gying zhing bzhugs pa /
T02D3590:218b-27: gos thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3590:218b-28: rma bya chen mo ni sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa /
T02D3590:218b-30: mdzes shing rma bya'i mdongs dang ldan pa mchog sbyin
T02D3590:218b-31: gyi phyag rgya phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag
T02D3590:218b-33: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ni sngon ma ji lta ba de bzhin no //
T02D3590:218b-34: gsang sngags chen ma rjes su 'dzin ma ni zhal gcig pa /
T02D3590:218b-36: sku mdog nag mo phyag g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang /
T02D3590:218b-38: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang /
T02D3590:218b-39: zhags pa bsnams pa'o zhes so //
T02D3590:218b-40: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni sku mdog dmar mo
T02D3590:218b-41: zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas pa dag
T02D3590:219a-0: @219a * // g-yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang zhags pa'o zhes so //
T02D3590:219a-1: yi ge gsum gyis mtshan cing rang gi sa bon
T02D3590:219a-2: gyi dbus su rang gi ming dang bcas pa ni
